title: Workflow Configuration Schema
description: Schema for validating workflow data.json configuration files

is_rag.description: Whether this workflow uses RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation)

role_definition.description: Clear definition of the AI assistant's role and expertise

knowledge_domain.description: Specific domain or area of knowledge this workflow covers

primary_task.description: Main task or objective the assistant should accomplish

response_structure.description: Template for how responses should be structured (supports markdown formatting)

docs.description: Documentation or knowledge base content (can be 'No documents available for this task.')

additional_persona_traits.description: Optional additional personality traits or characteristics

expertise_level.description: Target expertise level of the intended audience

qa_list.description: Predefined Q&A pairs for common questions
